text:
@GavinNewsom If you don't like staying at home, take a look at NY & New Jersey vs. CA. We're doing so much better because our health safety officers & @GavinNewsom had the wisdom & foresight to take the necessary steps to keep us safe. Stay home & live.
https://t.co/DYsRKTdvo2
